DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesia ( ASA ) classification score III male female volunteer Normal healthy individual medical history physical examination Uncomplicated airway anatomy Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1829 Subject willing give consent comply evaluation treatment schedule 1855 year age ( inclusive ) Negative durg screen marijuana , cocaine , ecstasy , phencyclidine ( PCP ) , amphetamine , benzodiazepine , opiates methamphetamine Woman childbearing age byst utilize reliable mean contraception Able read , speak understand English Physical psychological condition would impair study participation determine principal investigator Known suspect neurological pathology assess principal investigator History significant alcohol drug abuse , history allergy opioids propofol , history chronic drug requirement medical illness know alter pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics fentanyl and/or propofol Known suspect hypersensitivity study drug Taken medication within 2 day prior study drug administration , exception oral contraceptive Baseline tolerance 50 mA TES Pregnancy lactation Consumed food within 8 hour liquid within 4 hour prior study drug administration Participation investigational device durg study within 30 day enrollment Diagnosis sleep apnea Current prescription antidepressant antianxiety medication
